message: Let's split the money 60/40. It's a fair deal for the first round.
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal than your initial offer. Let's split it 55/45, which is still fair for both of us in the early stages of the game.
I understand there's inflation, but your offer wasn't generous enough considering the money loses value faster for me. I'm sticking with my initial proposal for now. Time is ticking!
